data.title: Best Bagels in Town
data.text:
I've been going there for years, and then drifted away and came back. These are easily the best bagels in town.  The place is clean.  Service is quick and friendly.  And the food is great.  I'm not really a bagel guy, but my favorites are:  their chicken cordon bleu and the BLT, both on the house made rolls.  Always great.

They are well worth the trip.  Go visit and enjoy!

data.title: I thought i was the only one who called this "punk rock bagels'
data.text: Yum. You can't go wrong. Hint - get cream cheese on one bagel and another plain. You'll have more than enough for both.

data.title: The best bagels!
data.text:
Plaza Bagel aka Punk Rock Bagels is THE place to go for bagels. They have been in Clifton for decades and I've been enjoying their bagels for just as long.

This place has a rock/punk feel to it and it is totally laid back. There aren't any fancy decorations--just great bagels! The staff that works at Plaza Bagel is awesome. Super cool and super friendly. 

I believe their bagels are bigger than the competition in the area and definitely the tastiest. They are always so fresh and I think it is because people are always buying them up so fast. Plaza Bagels has a good variety of traditional bagels and even have a few non-traditional flavors.

And their breakfast sandwiches are phenomenal! Bacon, egg and cheese on a plain bagel is to die for! They also have a ton of drinks to choose from in the different coolers and do make a decent cup of coffee. 

When people move out of Clifton and come back for a visit, one of the first places they go to is Plaza Bagel.

Try their bagels once and you'll be hooked!
